response.job_title: MSc. in Advanced Building Construction, LEED AP, WELL AP
response.summary: I am a civil engineer specialising in LEED and WELL certifications, performance energy and life cycle assessment for buildings. I am passionate about supporting and advising stakeholders who want to reduce environmental impact and achieve low carbon economy goals in their projects.
response.skills: Microsoft Office, AutoCAD, Gestión de proyectos, Microsoft Excel, Planificación estratégica, Ingeniería, Planificación de proyectos, Inglés, Liderazgo de equipos, Ingeniería civil, Microsoft Project, Microsoft Word, Revit, LEED, WELL, Construction Management, Spanish, English, Life Cycle Assessment, Project Coordination

profile_positions.description:
- Advised multidisciplinary teams in the implementation of sustainable strategies in new or existing buildings in Spain, according to LEED and WELL certification standards 
- Prepared technical documents to justify LEED and WELL certifications. 
- Designed 3D building models using DesingBuilder software to obtain building performance analysis. 
- Developed and analyzed a Building Life Cycle with OneClick software.
profile_positions.title: Sustainability Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Project Name: El Edén Shopping Center (165.300 sqm of build-up area). LEED C&S v.2009 Platinum. 

- Implemented, coordinated and supervised on-site environmental strategies to obtain LEED Certification, and comply with environmental legislation in Bogotá.
- Managed 25 people to keep environmental measures on site, as well as leading training protocols for site personnel.
- Leaded the process of responding to public entities on environmental issues, as well as reported monthly information to the District Secretary of the Environment of Bogota.
- Collected and organized information such as construction materials, the implementation of three Plans (Erosion and Sedimentation Control, Indoor Air Quality, and Construction and Demolition Waste Management), and Commissioning Process.
profile_positions.title: Construction Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Project Name: Panoramia Park Residential Building (110.000 sqm of build-up area). 

- Inspected and analyzed structural damage to houses in the vicinity of the project under construction.
- Managed and organized the after-sales real estate activities in new flats.
- Coordinated activities for the repair of neighboring houses and after sales, including ordering of materials, organization of staff and tools, supervision of activities.
- Documented the repair activities of neighboring houses and interventions in new flats with reports and photographic records, repair costs and time of execution.
profile_positions.title: Construction Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Project Name: Paralelo 26 Bussisnes Center (56.000 sqm of build-up area).  LEED C&S v.2009 Platinum.

- Managed on-site implementation of all requirements necessary to obtain LEED certification.
- Coordinated the construction works in the technical area, roofing, waterproofing in hard areas and landscaping, and execution of gardens.
- Prepared comparative tables, monitoring of tenders and contracting processes for activities related to LEED credit compliance.
- Researched building materials and products that meet LEED certification requirements.
profile_positions.title: Construction Engineer

education.degree_name: Master's Degree in Advanced Construction in the Building Industry
education.grade: Master's Degree in Advanced Construction in the Building Industry

company.name: JG Ingenieros S.A.
company.description:
JG Ingenieros, S.A. es una empresa de ingeniería independiente que actúa en todos los ámbitos de la construcción siendo especialistas en edificación y en el campo de las instalaciones eléctricas y mecánicas.

JG Ingenieros fue constituido en 1970 en Barcelona y actualmente dispone de oficinas en Barcelona, Bilbao, Lleida, Madrid, Málaga, Pamplona, San Sebastián, Sevilla, Tenerife, Valencia y Zaragoza y a nivel internacional está presente con oficina propia en Lima (Perú), Rabat (Marruevos) y Ciudad de Panamá (Panamá).

Dispone de una superficie total de oficinas de 4.000 m² y de una plantilla de 220 personas, de las cuales  170 son técnicos titulados.

JG Ingenieros desarrolla servicios inteligentes basados en la tecnología y teniendo muy en cuenta los intereses de sus clientes y de la sociedad. Tiene como principales objetivos:

JG Ingenieros presta servicios de ingeniería de proyectos, desde la fase de conceptuación hasta la de proyecto constructivo; servicios de ingeniería de ejecución, incluyendo el control de calidad y validación de pruebas y la dirección técnica de puesta en marcha; y los servicios de post-construcción, que engloban la ingeniería de mantenimiento, auditorias y asistencia técnica continuada.
